trans-unit.source: Creates a user-selectable list of ActiveX速 Data Objects (ADO) for the .NET Framework (ADO.NET) provider names.
The DataProviderNameConverter class is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> object that is typically referenced by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.

The names that are returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method are of ADO.NET providers, from the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactories.GetFactoryClasses%2A> method, that create data objects.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> method gets a value indicating whether the returned provider names are an exclusive list of possible values.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method gets a value indicating whether the returned provider names are a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter> class when the class is referenced by a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
Returns a list of the available ActiveX速 Data Objects (ADO) for the .NET Framework (ADO.NET) provider names.
The GetStandardValues method uses the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactories.GetFactoryClasses%2A> method to return a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object containing the ADO.NET provider names.
It converts this <xref:System.Data.DataTable> to a string array, and then converts this array to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> object.
The `context` parameter is not used by the GetStandardValues.

An object implementing the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> containing the names of the available ADO.NET providers.
Gets a value indicating whether the returned ActiveX速 Data Objects (ADO) for the .NET Framework (ADO.NET) provider names are an exclusive list of possible values.

If you derive a class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter> class and override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method to return an exclusive list of ADO.NET provider names, also override the GetStandardValuesExclusive method to return `true` when the provider name list is exclusive.
The `context` parameter is not used by the GetStandardValuesExclusive.

An object implementing the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether this object returns a standard set of ActiveX速 Data Objects (ADO) for the .NET Framework (ADO.NET) provider names that can be picked from a list.
The `context` parameter is not used by the GetStandardValuesSupported method.

An object implementing the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
